title: Fall With Me
description: July 24, 2018 - 11:38 PMVeronica and Eric had both chosen the same moment to end their lives, and the same method. They both went to the bridge when they would be alone, but by chance, neither was. And neither wanted to watch the other fall.Can their shared stories and experiences stop one another? Or will each of them fall together... one way, or the other?
author: Chelsea Bee
